thread.title: 4 casino employees booked in Lake Charles
thread.title_full: 4 casino employees booked in Lake Charles - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: 4 casino employees booked in Lake Charles
text:
LAKE CHARLES, La. (AP) - Authorities say four employees of a casino in Lake Charles have been arrested and booked on charges of computer fraud.
The four were employees of the Golden Nugget casino.
Louisiana State Police Col. Mike Edmonson told KPLC-TV ( http://bit.ly/1PK2s9b ) the arrests that were made over the last week resulted from an investigation. The probe was sparked by a call earlier in the month to the state police Gaming Enforcement Division.
All four face computer fraud charges. Two were booked with theft.
Information from: KPLC-TV, http://kplctv.com
